resources.string: How Will this App help me in Learning Machine Learning?
In this app, important concepts of machine learning will be presented using easy to understand animations and graphics.
This will greatly benefit visual learners.
Learners will also have better understanding of how different parts of Machine Learning model work under the hood
Understanding how Machine learning models work better will allow a better design of model to fit different scenarios.

Viewing and understanding of different parts of a model will allow easier understanding compared to reading articles, or viewing code for a Machine Learning model only, which are mostly designed as a "black box", where the inner workings of a model is obscured by the library providing the functionality.
What are the benefits of learning Machine Learning?
Many industries have moved to include Machine Learning in their business.
Data collection from various ways allow Machine learning, which deals a lot with data to thrive.
It is easier to land a job in bigger companies that deal with data collection and management, such as Google.
